thread.title: Tim Berners-Lee ‘Just Say No’ To Facebook’s Plan To Bastardize The Internet
thread.title_full: Tim Berners-Lee ‘Just Say No’ To Facebook’s Plan To Bastardize The Internet

title: Tim Berners-Lee ‘Just Say No’ To Facebook’s Plan To Bastardize The Internet
text:
Tim Berners-Lee: ‘Just Say No’ To Facebook’s Plan To Bastardize The Internet 
Infowars Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
Concerns about a single company creating an easily-tapped, AOL-esque version of the Internet aren’t particularly outlandish and, if you’ve studied history, are quite justified. Yet Facebook’s response to these concerns so far has been to claim critics are ';...
